sentences.zh: 春與秋，日夜分，寒暑平，是以金木之氣易以相變，故貌傷則致秋陰常雨，言傷則致春陽常旱也。

sentences.zh: 至於冬夏，日夜相反，寒暑殊絕，水火之氣不得相併，故視傷常奧，聽傷常寒者，其氣然也。

translations.idiomatic: In the first month of the first year of Yuanyan during Emperor Cheng's reign, the gate posts of the Zhangcheng Gate in Chang'an disappeared on their own, and the gate posts of the secondary gate at Hangu Pass also disappeared on their own.

sentences.zh: 京房易傳曰：「飢而不損茲謂泰，厥災水，厥咎牡亡。」

translations.literal: Jing Fang Yi Transmission says: "Hunger but not reduce this called Tai, its disaster water, its blame posts disappeared."
translations.idiomatic: Jing Fang's Yijing Commentary says: "When there is famine but taxes are not reduced, this is called excess. The disaster is flooding, and the blame is that the gate posts disappear."

sentences.zh: 妖辭曰：「關動牡飛，辟為亡道臣為非，厥咎亂臣謀篡。」

translations.literal: Ominous saying says: "Pass moves posts fly, ruler for lost way minister for error, its blame rebellious minister plans usurpation."
translations.idiomatic: The ominous saying states: "When the pass moves and gate posts fly away, it means the ruler has lost the Way and ministers commit errors. The blame lies with rebellious ministers plotting usurpation."

sentences.zh: 故谷永對曰：「章城門通路寢之路，函谷關距山東之險，城門關守國之固，固將去焉，故牡飛也。」

translations.literal: 故谷永對曰：「章城門通路寢之路，函谷關距山東之險，城門關守國之固，固將去焉，故牡飛也。」
translations.idiomatic: 故谷永對曰：「章城門通路寢之路，函谷關距山東之險，城門關守國之固，固將去焉，故牡飛也。」
